text: "He's Sure the Boy I Love" is a 1962 song by Darlene Love and The Blossoms but released by The Crystals. It was taken from The Crystal's second studio album He's a Rebel and went to number 11 in the United States. Category:1962 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Bette Midler songs Category:Darlene Love songs
title: He's Sure the Boy I Love
